body:
• What's on ...
    • What is it?
    • What is it made of?
    • What features does it have?
    • How does it work?
    • What can it be used for?
    • Why should I use it?
    • How do I get started?
  • What's not on ...
    • Comparisons to other NoSQL stores
    • Preaching that NoSQL is the ducks nuts
